Disorienting Strike.name: Disorienting Strike
Disorienting Strike.flavor: The initial blow is only the start of your enemy’s troubles, as he becomes unsteady and confused.
Disorienting Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity or Strength modifier damage. The target and any enemy who starts its turn adjacent to the target provoke opportunity attacks from you when shifting or teleporting. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.
Disorienting Strike.special: You may use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when charging.

Babbling Rage.name: Babbling Rage
Babbling Rage.flavor: The sense of wrongness which flows out from you leaves your foes open to attack.
Babbling Rage.effect: You enter the babbling rage. Until the end of the encounter, enemies adjacent to you grant combat advantage.

Maddening Redirection.name: Maddening Redirection
Maddening Redirection.flavor: When an enemy gets near you, it can’t distinguish one target from another.
Maddening Redirection.effect: You assume the maddening redirection stance. Until the stance ends, when an adjacent enemy damages you with a melee attack while at least one other creature is adjacent to that enemy, you can take only half of the damage and cause a creature adjacent to the enemy to take the other half.
